NoticeData.Contents: Nine Chronicles M is now open! You can find the mobile version of Nine Chronicles on various countries' Google Play and App Store. Multiplanetary: Introducing a new network system The existing Nine Chronicles mainnet had limitations on the total transaction volume it could handle. Also, due to the accumulated play records over the past few years, there were difficulties in competing in the new system. To overcome these issues, we are introducing Multiplanetary, which supports more than two networks. - The play records of the existing mainnet will be named Odin and can be played as before. - With the introduction of the Multiplanetary system, a new network named Heimdall will be launched. - Each network is named after a planet and has independent play records and economic systems. For more details, please refer to the following link: [https://bit.ly/9C_M_New_Chain_Heimdall](https://bit.ly/9C_M_New_Chain_Heimdall) Balance adjustment Various values will be changed to allow early users to enjoy various equipment crafts and adventure experiences. The initial reinforcement cost is reduced, and the initial experience points for equipment crafting, as well as clear rewards for each world, are increased compared to before. New Aura release Aegis Aura (ARENA SPECIAL) and Barrage Aura (ADVENTURE SPECIAL), which can be summoned with Golden Dust, have been added. Check the summon menu for more details. Season Pass system added A Season Pass system has been added, allowing you to receive various rewards with Courage Experience that accumulates just by playing game.

[ Improvement ] Add rewards when creating new avatars - Crystal 200000, Long Sword, Casual Clothes Change Lobby Image - Rearrange background and each content location Change the loading image - Display loading images by adventure, arena, shop, workshop content Change New Avatar Tutorial [ Bugfix ] Corrected the part where the acquired crystal calculation is not properly calculated when grinding the upgraded aura.

[ Added 'Patrol Reward' Function ] Earn a set reward every 12 hours depending on the level. Rewards can be earned every 12 hours over time even if you're not connected to the game. Can earn crystal and silver dust rewards. [ Added Nimble Aura Summon ] Nimble Aura Summon Additional Open to Summon with 10 Silver Dusts 1 out of 3 grades can be obtained by summoning. [ Added Nimble Aura equipment ] Add Nimble Aura equipment that all users can summon more than once a day Same aura confinement can be used as a reinforcing material The Nimble Aura is not eligible for purchase through NCG or for Voucher events.
